Title: Georges simenon, inspector maigret and his relevance to the practice of neurology Georges Simenon, Inspector Maigret e a sua relevância para a prática da Neurologia
Abstract: © 2017, Associacao Arquivos de Neuro-Psiquiatria. All rights reserved.Georges Simenon’s work, including his famous ‘romans durs’ novels and the forensic investigations carried out by his artistic creation, Inspector Maigret, bear many similarities to some of the diagnostic methods of the founders of Neurology, particularly Jean-Martin Charcot.
